reviews.author: Aveenash Tewari
reviews.text:
While the tantalizing aromas and vibrant atmosphere at Allo Beirut immediately set the stage for a delightful culinary experience, the service unfortunately fell short. The staggered arrival of dishes, with lengthy pauses between courses, disrupted the flow of the meal.

While the service could use some refinement, the exceptional food and inviting outdoor atmosphere make it a worthwhile experience for those who are willing to exercise a little patience.

reviews.author: Sara Sanchez
reviews.text: Beautiful and great location of this venue and perfectly connected with buses. The restaurant is beautiful inside and the service is great too! The food is outstanding ! Had the watermelon and feta salad that was delicious and a falafel that was delicious too! Highly recommend this restaurant for lunch or dinner, a great place to visit and enjoy alone or with friends!

reviews.author: Yaser A
reviews.text:
Allo Beirut at City Walk is a great spot in the heart of Dubai for a unique take on Lebanese flavors. The staff here are fantastic, friendly, attentive, and quick with service. I ordered the healthy beef shawarma, and the taste was absolutely amazing! The beef was well-seasoned and flavorful, which made every bite enjoyable. However, since it‚Äôs a health-focused option, the shawarma served hot and bread  served cold, which may surprise some. Presentation could use a bit more flair, and no sides were offered, which might leave you wanting just a little extra.

The location at City Walk is perfect, offering an open, vibrant atmosphere that truly feels like you‚Äôre right in the middle of Dubai. The view is fantastic, adding a great ambiance to the experience. Plus, the restaurant is wheelchair accessible, making it convenient for all visitors.

Allo Beirut offers a delicious meal and a great experience. With slight improvements in presentation, it could easily become a five-star spot!‚Äù

reviews.author: Areeba Arshad
reviews.text:
The interior of the restaurant is well done. Very funky and fun. Suits the name. It is spacious and seating is comfortable. Very Kid friendly.
This time around the service was a-little slow but the staff was kind enough to make it up to us by giving our babies complementary fruit.
We ordered the hummus with pinenuts, mutabal, beef shawarma and mix grill platter. The food was delicious specially the shishtouk kabab. The only draw back is that standard bread served is cold. For hot bread you have to place an order or ask however it should always be served hot.
